AI Description: g2clib is a library for the manipulation of geophysical data in the GEMPAK format. It provides routines for reading, writing, and manipulating meteorological and geophysical data.
Core Features:
1. Reading and writing GEMPAK files
2. Geophysical data manipulation
3. Support for meteorological data
4. Data analysis and visualization functions
General Tags: Geophysics, Meteorology, Data Manipulation, Data Analysis
